level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor may issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-189, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 7-1501.01.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 5-189, see Mayor's Order 86-62, April 22, 1986.
Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 5-189, see Mayor's Order 86-62, April 22, 1986.
